game.name: SCP: Short Story
game.shortDescription: SCP: Short Story is a first-person shooter set in a world where the K-class scenario destroyed almost every living form. You’ll have to get through this dead world, retrieve essential documents from Site-17, and most importantly - do not get killed by what survived.
